title: regard to the matters specified in subsection (5) of that section, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997 (Section 38)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997 (Section 38) 

Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited credit union act 1997 (section 38) order 2024

title: regard to the matters specified in subsection (5) of that section, hereby order as
heading: 2. The rate of 2 per cent per month is specified for the purpose of
text_raw:
2. The rate of 2 per cent per month is specified for the purpose of 
subsection (1)(a) of section 38 of the Credit Union Act 1997 (No. 15 of 1997). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 April, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [137] 3
